$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ cd spack/bin
$ ./spack install zlib

Really? Why do I have to install zlib? Is that the only way to get spack working? Or, do I need to install SOME package (if so, what are my choices?) Why do I need to install zlib?

Please clarify what's going on here
title: installation instructions are confusing
